original: Levan, Uno Nils Olof, försäljningschef, Vargön, f. 6/4/90 i Östra Frölunda, Älvsb. 1., av godsäg. August L. o. Hilma Hansson. G. m. Dagny Kindstrand. — Stud:ex. 09, Gbgs handiinst. fackkurs 10, stud. i Engl. o. Frankr. 13-14. Bokh. o. korresp. v. Wargöns A-B 10-15, förest, f. pappers- Q. celiuiosaavd. v. Sv. Emissions A-B resp. Transmarina Komp. A-B 15-17, försäljn xhef f. papper o. cellulosa v. Wargöns A-B sed. 17, även f. legeringar sed. 32.
translated: Levan, Uno Nils Olof, sales manager, Vargön, b. 6/4/90 in Östra Frölunda, Älvsb. 1st, son of estate owner August L. and Hilma Hansson. Married to Dagny Kindstrand. — Graduated with bachelor's degree 09, specialized course at Gothenburg's Handicraft Institute 10, studied in England and France 13-14. Bookkeeper and correspondent at Wargöns A-B 10-15, head of the paper and cellulose department at Swedish Emissions A-B and Transmarina Komp. A-B 15-17, sales manager for paper and cellulose at Wargöns A-B since 17, also for alloys since 32.

education.name: Specialized Course at Gothenburg's Handicraft Institute

workExperience.title: Head of the Paper and Cellulose Department
Sales Manager for Paper and Cellulose
